data.title: Dallas Mavericks Roster
data.meta_description: Dallas Mavericks scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Draft Rights to Rodrigue Beaubois, the #25 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Dallas Mavericks from the Oklahoma City Thunder on June 25, 2009. Rodrigue Beaubois signed a multi-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks on July 6, 2009.

Draft Rights to Jae Crowder, the #4 pick in the Second Round of the 2012 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Dallas Mavericks from the Cleveland Cavaliers on June 28, 2012. Jae Crowder signed a multi-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks on July 20, 2012.

Draft Rights to Jared Cunningham, the #24 pick in the First Round of the 2012 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Dallas Mavericks from the Cleveland Cavaliers on June 28, 2012. Jared Cunningham signed a multi-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks on July 21, 2012.

Draft Rights to Bernard James, the #3 pick in the Second Round of the 2012 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Dallas Mavericks from the Cleveland Cavaliers on June 28, 2012. Bernard James signed a multi-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks on July 25, 2012.

Draft Rights to Dirk Nowitzki, the #9 pick in the First Round of the 1998 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Dallas Mavericks from the Milwaukee Bucks on June 24, 1998. Dirk Nowitzki signed a multi-year contract with the Dallas Mavericks on January 21, 1999. Dirk Nowitzki signed a multi-year extension with the Dallas Mavericks on October 22, 2001. Dirk Nowitzki signed a multi-year extension with the Dallas Mavericks on September 26, 2006. Dirk Nowitzki re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on July 19, 2010.

Josh Akognon signed a contract with the Dallas Mavericks on April 3, 2013. Josh Akognon re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on April 13, 2013.

Elton Brand signed a contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on July 13, 2012.

Vince Carter signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on December 12, 2011.

Mike James signed a contract with the Dallas Mavericks on January 8, 2013. Mike James re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on January 18, 2013. Mike James re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on January 28, 2013.

Chris Kaman signed a contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on July 13, 2012.

O.J. Mayo signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on July 19, 2012.

Brandan Wright signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Dallas Mavericks on December 9, 2011.
